### Requirements
The Department of National Defence is seeking a contractor to provide support for the Naval Mine Countermeasures (NMCM) Software Systems Renewal for a period of five (5) years. The contractor must provide technical services, including software development, maintenance, and support for various NMCM systems. The contractor will also be responsible for providing support for the production of NMCM reports and the application of NMCM software packages.

The successful bidder will be required to provide support for the following tasks:
- Software development and maintenance for NMCM systems
- Development and support of new software packages
- Development and support of interfaces between software packages
- Maintenance and support of databases
- Application and testing of NMCM software packages
- Production of NMCM reports
- Development and support of deployable hardware and software systems for use by NMCM units
- Support for laboratory virtual instrument engineering workbench programming
- Support for mine simulation systems
- Support for robotic operating systems

## Security
The requirement is subject to a preference for Canadian services and is also subject to the Controlled Goods Program. The contractor must adhere to the security requirements outlined in Part 6 - Security, Financial and Other Requirements, and Part 7 - Resulting Contract Clauses.

## Certifications and Additional Information
Bidders are required to provide certifications and additional information as outlined in Part 5
